title: Private Balcony Featured in This 1BR/1BA Apartment*
posting_body: ['CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'THE COLONNADE APARTMENTS', '1 bedroom 1 bath \xa0 700Sq.', 'Ft \xa0 $2,605 - $2,908', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Picture yourself coming home to this one-bedroom, one-bathroom layout from The Colonnade Apartments.', 'From the front door, you will notice the gourmet kitchen, which features quartz countertops and cabinetry with brushed nickel hardware.', 'Stainless steel appliances accent the cooking space.', 'Beyond the breakfast bar, you will see the spacious living space and a door to the private patio or balcony.', 'In the master bedroom, natural light from the double-pane windows brightens the space.', 'After touring the home, check out The Colonnade’s full range of amenities, including a shimmering pool, a sauna, and a soothing spa.', 'Other shared amenities include a business center and a computer room.', 'Downtown, SJSU, and Interstate 280 are all nearby as well.', 'Call the leasing office to learn more about the pet policy today!', 'Welcome to The Colonnade Apartments!', 'Address:', '201 S 4th Street San Jose, CA 95112']
